mapper.sql: id, out_time, back_time, sub_com, sub_street, sub_area, sub_provice, picid, sensorid, parse1, parse2, parse3
mapper.insert:
insert into people_out_info_table
id,
out_time,
back_time,
sub_com,
sub_street,
sub_area,
sub_provice,
picid,
sensorid,
parse1,
parse2,
parse3,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{outTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{backTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{subCom,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{subStreet,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{subArea,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{subProvice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{picid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sensorid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{parse1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{parse2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{parse3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update people_out_info_table
out_time = #{outTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
back_time = #{backTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sub_com = #{subCom,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sub_street = #{subStreet,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sub_area = #{subArea,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sub_provice = #{subProvice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
picid = #{picid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sensorid = #{sensorid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parse1 = #{parse1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parse2 = #{parse2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parse3 = #{parse3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update people_out_info_table set out_time = #{outTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, back_time = #{backTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sub_com = #{subCom,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sub_street = #{subStreet,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sub_area = #{subArea,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sub_provice = #{subProvice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, picid = #{picid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sensorid = #{sensorid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parse1 = #{parse1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parse2 = #{parse2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parse3 = #{parse3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT( out_time, '%Y%m%d' ) AS day, COUNT( 1 ) AS sum FROM people_out_info_table WHERE out_time >= date_sub(now(), interval #{timeNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER} DAY ) and (sub_provice = #{localId,jdbcType=INTEGER} or sub_area = #{localId,jdbcType=INTEGER} or sub_street = #{localId,jdbcType=INTEGER} or sub_com = #{localId,jdbcType=INTEGER}) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( out_time, '%Y%m%d' )

select o.id, o.out_time as outTime, o.back_time as backTime, o.sub_com as subCom, o.sub_street as subStreet, o.sub_area as subArea, o.sub_provice as subProvice, o.picid, o.sensorid, o.parse1, o.parse2, o.parse3, p.pic_path_out as picPathOut,p.pic_path_in as picPathIn,p.parse1 as picParse1,p.parse2 as picParse2, l.local_id as localId, l.local_name as localName, l.attr as localAttr, l.phone as localPhone from people_out_info_table o,pic_info_table p,local_info_table l where o.picid=p.picid AND l.local_id = #{localId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and (sub_provice = #{localId,jdbcType=INTEGER} or sub_area = #{localId,jdbcType=INTEGER} or sub_street = #{localId,jdbcType=INTEGER} or sub_com = #{localId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

select o.id, o.out_time as outTime, o.back_time as backTime, o.sub_com as subCom, o.sub_street as subStreet, o.sub_area as subArea, o.sub_provice as subProvice, o.picid, o.sensorid, o.parse1, o.parse2, o.parse3, p.pic_path_out as picPathOut,p.pic_path_in as picPathIn,p.parse1 as picParse1,p.parse2 as picParse2, l.local_id as localId, l.local_name as localName, l.attr as localAttr, l.phone as localPhone from people_out_info_table o,pic_info_table p,local_info_table l where o.picid=p.picid AND l.local_id = #{localId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and (sub_provice = #{localId,jdbcType=INTEGER} or sub_area = #{localId,jdbcType=INTEGER} or sub_street = #{localId,jdbcType=INTEGER} or sub_com = #{localId,jdbcType=INTEGER}) AND (o.out_time between #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP});
